name: [r]artworks
tagline: random expermients in form of software...
body:

```
╭─rartworks@localhost  ~
╰─$ ls projects
```

## Projects

### [Halu](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.rartworks.halu.android)
[![halu](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1631752/17127682/c479d96e-5307-11e6-8a74-9343eb5beecb.png)](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.rartworks.halu.android)

Halu is a arcade-platform game, for Android. The only objetive is survive as far as you can, beating your friend's scores.
Many dangers exists in Halu's world. There are rocks that can hurt any living thing. You can avoid them by jumping or shrinking, but don't shrink too much... you can disappear! Also, your soul will try to escape and you will have to keep it at your center. The speed will be increased all the time. Be prepared.

----------

### [dropbox-unix-backup-tool](https://github.com/rodri042/dropbox-unix-backup-tool)
[![dropbox-unix-backup-tool](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1631752/17128073/982f0f52-530a-11e6-821f-d86f9bee0a16.png)](https://github.com/rodri042/dropbox-unix-backup-tool)

An command-line-unidirectional-directory-synchronizer with Dropbox, for doing backups. It syncs the files from disk to the cloud, with the feature of previewing changes before commit (similar to the `git status` output).

----------

### [arduino-midi-player](https://github.com/rodri042/arduino-midi-player)
[![arduino-midi-player](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1631752/17128031/2887b168-530a-11e6-93d2-3c7e3c678b77.png)](https://github.com/rodri042/arduino-midi-player)

A MIDI player with buzzers, and a proof of concept of controlling an Arduino board with javascript. We all love MIDIs <3
